preference.name: DefiningTraceReportTable_ColumnWidthPreferences
preference.preference_description: Specifies the width of the columns for the properties listed in the DefiningTraceReportTable_ColumnPreferences preference. The width values are modified as the user resizes the columns in a traceability report. Valid Values: Accepts one or more integers as values. Each integer defines the column width in characters.
